title: Frontend
desc: Knowledge and experience writing single-page-applications using Vue.js, React.js and Angular. state managment such as vite, Redux and NgRx, and libraries such as Axios, bootstrap, vutify, element plus, and more

title: Backend
desc: Experience with building apps using nodejs, and libraries such as expressjs, parser, cryptr and more. Commit projects using git.

title: Data-base
